_comment: Use this template when contributing a new bloatware signature.
_instructions: 1. Copy this file. 2. Fill in every field. 3. Run: python scripts/validate_signature.py your_file.json 4. Submit a PR.
_component_type_options: program | service | task | startup | driver | uwp | telemetry
_match_rules_notes: At least name_pattern is required. Use ^ and $ anchors. Patterns are case-insensitive.
_classification_options: CORE | ESSENTIAL | OPTIONAL | BLOAT | AGGRESSIVE | UNKNOWN
_related_notes: List signature_ids of related components (e.g. a service and its parent program).
breakage_notes: Describe what breaks when this component is disabled/removed.
_evidence_notes: Link to community documentation, forum post, or article confirming bloatware status.
